org.openimaj.video.processing.motion.MotionEstimatorAlgorithm

    Package Description
    org.openimaj.video.processing.motion  

    • Uses of MotionEstimatorAlgorithm in org.openimaj.video.processing.motion

      Subclasses of MotionEstimatorAlgorithm in org.openimaj.video.processing.motion 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MotionEstimatorAlgorithm.PHASE_CORRELATION
      Basic phase correlation algorithm that finds peaks in the cross-power spectrum between two images.
      static class  MotionEstimatorAlgorithm.TEMPLATE_MATCH
      Within a search window around the subimages detect most likely match and thus motion.
